title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 75 - Speech-Language Pathology and Audiology
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 75 - Speech-Language Pathology and Audiology

State Regulations
§ 75.1 - Professional study of speech-language pathology
§ 75.2 - Experience in speech-language pathology
§ 75.3 - Examination in speech-language pathology
§ 75.4 - Professional study of audiology
§ 75.5 - Experience in audiology
§ 75.6 - Examination in audiology
§ 75.7 - Licensure by endorsement in speech-language pathology or audiology
§ 75.8 - Continuing competency for speech-language pathologists and/or audiologists

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 75

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 212, 6502, 6504, 6506, 6507, 6508, 8206, 8209, arts. 130, 131, 133, 135, 139, 143, 144, 147, 148, 155, 156, 159

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
